features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User login page with mock authentication accepting any email and password (6+ chars), cookie-based session management, protected route middleware

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Overview page displaying statistics cards (total donations, active members, pending applications), charts using Recharts, and recent donations list

features.name: Donations Management
features.description: Comprehensive donation management system with list view (filtering, sorting, search, pagination), collection box (kumbara) management, and reports page

features.name: Members Management
features.description: Member listing with search and filters, new member registration form with validation, membership dues tracking

features.name: Social Aid Management
features.description: Complex social aid system with beneficiary tracking (comprehensive forms with immigration status, family structure, health status), aid applications management, payment processing, and statistics dashboard

features.name: Layout Components
features.description: Responsive sidebar navigation with collapsible menu, header with user info, breadcrumbs navigation, page transitions, and progress bar

features.name: Shared Data Table Component
features.description: Reusable data table component with sorting, filtering, searching, pagination, loading states, empty states, and Excel export functionality

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive UI component library based on Radix UI and Shadcn UI including buttons, cards, forms, dialogs, tables, tabs, dropdowns, selects, checkboxes, switches, badges, alerts, avatars, breadcrumbs, skeleton loaders, and toast notifications

features.name: Shared Utility Components
features.description: Shared utility components including page header, empty state, construction page indicator

features.name: Form Validation System
features.description: Zod-based form validation schemas for login, donations, members, and social aid beneficiaries with React Hook Form integration

features.name: Mock Data Service
features.description: Mock service layer providing simulated API calls for donations, members, beneficiaries, applications, dashboard statistics with pagination support

features.name: State Management
features.description: Zustand stores for user authentication state and sidebar state management

features.name: Events Management
features.description: Events management page for tracking and managing association events

features.name: Documents Management
features.description: Documents management page for handling association documents

features.name: Settings and Administration
features.description: Settings pages for general settings, user management, and backup functionality

features.name: Utility Functions and Constants
features.description: Utility functions (cn helper for className merging), constants (navigation items, status variants, pagination settings), and type definitions

features.name: Query Provider
features.description: TanStack Query provider wrapper for server state management

features.name: Custom Hooks
features.description: Custom React hooks for debouncing and media queries
